title: Paper chain
brief_description: Shows the entire processes involved in the production of quality paper at one of Wiggins Teape many paper mills. Three types of raw material, old rags, wood pulp, and esparto grass are used. Shows special treatment for special types of paper and the innumerable uses of paper in all walks of life, and the extraordinary situation which would exist without paper.
